product_name: Point 65 Rum Runner Stand Up Paddleboard
long_description: The Point 65 Rum Runner Stand Up Paddleboard gives you all the performance of a rigid SUP in a take-apart paddleboard you can fit in the trunk of your car. Made of super tough polyethylene, the 3 sections make for easy transportation and snap together in a matter of seconds. Displacement hull tracks straight and increases glide, making it ideal for longer paddles. EVA deck pad with structured surface provides additional traction and all day comfort. Spring-loaded tracking fin retracts when hitting obstacles or when making a beach landing. The Point 65 Rum Runner Stand Up Paddleboard features a watertight storage hatch in bow, along with easy carry grab rails and toggles.
short_description: The Point 65 Rum Runner Stand Up Paddleboard gives you all the performance of a rigid SUP in a take-apart paddleboard you can fit in the trunk of your car.
